  physical_appearance: \The image shows a set of twenty four pieces of paper. The one on the extreme top left is a note. There is a note that states
 \\These drawings of Indian heathen temples \u0026 idols were done by a native artist and given to me by the Rev Symons (?) of Madras\\. Four of the drawings are in the portrait orientation while the other nineteen are in the landscape orientation. The drawings follow a similar pattern in that a single pillar is featured

  subject_terms_1: together with an image of a Hindu deity or idol in the middle.\ temples (buildings) notes deities idols Hinduism

metadata.title_text: Drawings of South Indian Architectural Temple Figures Drawings of South Indian Architectural Temple Figures with note
metadata.physical_appearance: "The image shows a set of twenty four pieces of paper. The one on the extreme top left is a note. There is a note that states, ""These drawings of Indian heathen temples & idols were done by a native artist and given to me by the Rev Symons (?) of Madras"". Four of the drawings are in the portrait orientation while the other nineteen are in the landscape orientation. The drawings follow a similar pattern in that a single pillar is featured
metadata.subject_terms_1: together with an image of a Hindu deity or idol in the middle." temples (buildings) notes deities idols Hinduism
